Query.sql: select puesto, nb_puesto, cd_usr_act from puesto where cd_usr_act = {usr}
select * from inst where nu_doc = {nu_doc} and nu_inst = {nu_inst}
select * from param where ID_CLASIFICACION = 'C6' AND ID_PARAMETRO_PADRE ={idParam}
select ID_PARAMETRO, TX_PARAMETRO from param where ID_CLASIFICACION = {idParam}
